Welcome to the biggest update we've ever done!

• Completely rewritten graphics engine!
• Completely redrawn environment textures - much sharper and higher quality than before
• Dramatically improved lighting
• 64 bit support
• Added screen shake
• Improved sound effects
• Various other tweaks and bug fixes

Please review us and tell your friends about the game if you like it!

If you've got any feedback or questions then please get in touch at: payback2.support@apex-designs.net

Our biggest update yet!

• Completely rewritten physics engine for improved handling, collisions and destructability
• You now shoot forward from vehicles, rather than sideways
• Improved vehicles: Helicopter, truck, hotrod, van, pickup truck, ice cream van, fjord and bus
• Reworked "wanted" system, your "wanted" level is now shown
• Completely rewritten particle system for improved explosions, wind effects, smoke and tire debris
• Reworked cities and some campaign events
• Completely rewritten skidmark system
• Sound effect improvements - variable tire effects, wind, brake hiss and metal scraping
• Reworked scenery objects: Bollard, rock, briefcase, key, cycle sign, gravestone, prison bed and bedside table
• Added different wheel types to the vehicles
• Performance optimisations
• Loads of other tweaks and bug fixes

Please review us and tell your friends about the game if you like it - it really helps us keep improving it!

Also, if you've got any feedback or questions then please get in touch at: payback2.support@apex-designs.net
